Text: is this really in English, or french???? IMDb says french, title here says English. just wanna be sure b4 i dl. thx

ok, i just went and dl'ed it, yes it Is english. BUT wasn't spoken in english. i guess u'd call it dubbed in english. so..... the mouths  don't match the words spoken. just letting ya all know.
